description: The Trump administration conceded that Kilmar Abrego Garcia, who officials allege is a member of the MS-13 gang, was wrongly deported to El Salvador.
title: Supreme Court says Trump admin must 'facilitate' release of man wrongly deported to El Salvador prison

description: A family visiting from Spain and a pilot were killed Thursday when a helicopter touring the New York City area plummeted into the Hudson River.
title: The moment a helicopter plummeted into the Hudson River was captured on video

description: A helicopter carrying a family visiting from Spain and their pilot crashed into the Hudson River, killing all six people on board. City officials, including Mayor Eric Adams, praised the rapid response from emergency crews, while the investigation into the cause remains ongoing.
title: 3 adults and 3 children killed in Hudson River helicopter crash

description: Rita Daniels learned at 9 that she is the great-great-great-grandniece of famed abolitionist Harriet Tubman, who led countless enslaved Africans to freedom through the Underground Railroad.
title: A federal website watered down the Underground Railroad. Harriet Tubman's descendant wants to know why.

description: After many years of impassioned calls for an Oscar recognizing the art of the stunt, the film academy has decided to give it an official award.
title: Oscars to add stunt design award for its 100th ceremony

description: Trump said in a Cabinet meeting that workers vouched for by employers would "go out"  and "they’re going to come back as legal workers.”
title: Trump floats plan for undocumented farm and hotel workers to work legally in the U.S.

description: The nation’s top health agency will undertake a “massive testing and research effort” to determine the cause of autism, HHS RFK Jr. said.
title: Kennedy says HHS will determine the cause of autism by September

description: The Department of Homeland Security announced Feb. 25 that it was mandating that all people in the United States illegally register with the federal government, and said those who didn’t self-report could face fines or prosecution.
title: Judge allows requirement that everyone in the U.S. illegally must register to move forward

description: After yesterday’s jump, the markets started to reflect the full scope of President Donald Trump’s trade war today, while Democrats raised questions about the timing of his stock-buying suggestion.
title: The full scope of Trump's tariff agenda settles in: From the Politics Desk

description: The original Broadway recording of “Hamilton” by Lin-Manuel Miranda, Vicente Fernández’s enduring ranchera song “El Rey” and Freddy Fender’s breakthrough song “Before the Next Teardrop Falls” have been inducted into the National Recording Registry at the Library of Congress.
title: Hits by Lin-Manuel Miranda, Vicente Fernández and Freddy Fender added to National Recording Registry

description: Greely High School in Cumberland, Maine, has become a focal point in Trump's crusade against transgender student athletes.
title: How one Maine high school became the center of Trump's war on trans student athletes

description: While Wall Street spent the past week sweating over whether President Donald Trump’s now-altered tariff plan would push the economy into a recession or ignite a bear market, Rachel Hazit knew exactly what to do.
title: Retail investors are running head first into this topsy-turvy market

description: President Donald Trump’s aggressive tariff policy on April 2 didn’t just cause mayhem in the stock market.
title: Trump tariffs mean higher prices and big losses for Amazon sellers that source from China

description: Weezer will go through with its gig at the Coachella music festival this weekend in the wake of Los Angeles police wounding the wife of bassist Scott Shriner, a source close to the band told NBC News on Thursday.
title: Weezer still set to play Coachella after police shoot wife of bassist

description: Video shows the moment a helicopter crashed into the Hudson River in New York. Multiple fatalities have been reported and at least four people were on the helicopter.
title: Video shows moment helicopter crashes into Hudson River

description: Democratic Sen. Michael Bennet is running for governor of Colorado next year, according to three sources familiar with his plans.
title: Sen. Michael Bennet will run for governor of Colorado in 2026

description: A man already jailed on federal charges of attempting to assassinate then-candidate Donald Trump will face additional state charges, Florida’s attorney general said.
title: Florida charges Ryan Routh, who allegedly tried to assassinate Trump

description: Congressional Democrats are questioning whether President Donald Trump and his allies may have improperly acted on his suggestion Wednesday that it was a “great time to buy” stocks shortly before announcing he was cutting back on some of his new tariffs — a move that made the markets go up.
title: Democrats question whether Trump and his allies engaged in insider trading on tariffs

description: At least four dead in Hudson River helicopter crash, sources say
title: Follow live coverage from NBC New York

description: Wealthy investors have made the best trade over the past week — largely doing nothing.
title: The wealthy are loading up on cash, gold and family trusts during market turmoil

description: The New York Police Department confirmed the crash, but it was not known who was aboard or the extent of any injuries.
title: Watch live: NBC New York coverage of Hudson River helicopter crash

description: Last month’s national NBC News poll found a near-majority of voters see CEOs of large corporations as being too supportive of President Donald Trump, while about the same share of voters also said they think the news media is too critical of the president.
title: Plurality of voters feel wary of CEOs' support for Trump, while a similar share say media is too critical

description: Bowen Yang is revisiting a “painful” part of his adolescent years.
title: Bowen Yang opens up about ‘healing’ after his parents put him in conversion therapy

description: Noah Wyle says he’s “profoundly sad and disappointed” about a legal action alleging “The Pitt” is an unsanctioned revival of “ER."
title: Noah Wyle responds to claim ‘The Pitt’ is an ‘ER’ reboot

description: Today, Jennifer Aniston says she’s the “most in shape” she’s been in a long time, thanks to her favorite workout routine.
title: Jennifer Aniston says this 1 workout made her 'the most in shape' she's ever been

description: The New York Police Department said Thursday afternoon that there was a helicopter crash into the Hudson River.
title: Live Updates: Helicopter crashes in the Hudson River in New York City

description: Secretary of State Marco Rubio said the presence of Columbia student protester Mahmoud Khalil in the U.S. would have “potentially serious adverse foreign policy consequences,” according to a memo obtained by NBC News.
title: Mahmoud Khalil should be deported over serious 'foreign policy consequences,' Rubio memo says

description: A “Wheel of Fortune” contestant seemingly knew where she went wrong after incorrectly guessing the lyrics to a popular Disney song.
title: 'Wheel of Fortune' contestant flubs Disney lyrics puzzle — and immediately realizes her mistake

description: Jon Hamm has gone from “Mad Men” to fanboy.
title: Jon Hamm fanboys over Bad Bunny and shares the nickname the artist gave to him

description: The Education Department’s Office of Inspector General plans to conduct a “series of reviews” into the mass layoffs at the nation’s education agency.
title: Drastic staffing cuts at the Education Department to be reviewed

description: What is peptide therapy to boost athletic performance and speed up recovery time? Here's what the science shows about whether it works.
title: What to know about peptide therapy

description: WASHINGTON — The U.S. ambassador to Ukraine is stepping down from her post after nearly three years in Kyiv amid uncertainty over the Trump administration’s attempts to broker a peace deal to end the Russia-Ukraine war.
title: US ambassador to Ukraine to step down as peace talks uncertain

description: Usually, when a governor gets briefed on new information by a key adviser, it happens behind closed doors.
title: Kentucky Gov. Andy Beshear nabs the latest must-have for a major politician: His own podcast

description: A plane carrying five members of the U.S.
title: Plane with 5 House members clipped by aircraft on taxiway at Reagan National Airport near D.C.

description: President Donald Trump said he was not tracking a fall in the stock market as he met with his Cabinet secretaries, a plunge on Thursday that came amid worsening trade tensions with China.
title: Trump punts on markets question as stocks continue to fall

description: "The Real Housewives of Beverly Hills" alumni Teddi Mellencamp revealed her father, singer John Mellencamp, has started planning her burial amid her stage 4 cancer diagnosis.
title: Teddi Mellencamp says her father John is already planning her burial amid stage 4 cancer diagnosis

description: Former MI6 chief Sir Richard Dearlove says that if President Donald Trump wants a Nobel Peace Prize he should hold off negotiating a Russia-Ukraine ceasefire.
title: Former U.K. spy chief has advice for Trump: Go slow on Ukraine, if you want the Nobel

description: In December 2024, Oklahoma officials say Jason Morris convinced his online, elderly girlfriend to send him $120,000 to pay for an oil vessel carrying 700,000 barrels in Alaska he allegedly owned to return to shore.
title: Oklahoma woman scammed $1.5 million out of elderly women posing as men in fake romances

description: President Donald Trump’s tariffs aren’t the only presidential policy that is weighing on Constellation Brands.
title: Trump's immigration policy is weighing on beer sales, Constellation Brands CEO says

description: President Donald Trump’s trade war has thrown the oil market into deep uncertainty, triggering wild swings in crude prices, undermining investor confidence and jeopardizing domestic production.
title: Trump trade war uncertainty threatens U.S. oil production

description: ESPN host Pat McAfee has promised to make "some sort of silver lining in a very terrible situation" after he amplified a sexual internet rumor about a University of Mississippi student that she says is false and "ruined" her life.
title: Pat McAfee promises to make 'silver lining' after sharing viral rumor about college student

description: Worry is lingering on Wall Street, even after President Donald Trump paused some of his wide-ranging tariffs.
title: Many on Wall Street say sell the rallies because Trump can't undo damage already done

description: Some of the stiffest new tariffs are on hold, but experts say shoppers’ bills for White House trade policies are coming due soon.
title: What you're still set to pay more for under Trump’s tariffs

description: Ray Mendoza, who directed the movie with "Civil War" director Alex Gibney, said he didn't base it on 'real events' but on his and fellow SEALs' memories, which are "truer."
title: 'Warfare' co-director gives immersive 'voice' to Gen X, millennial veterans' Iraq War memories

description: Lori Vallow Daybell, the "doomsday mom" who is on trial for the death of her fourth husband, had a tense exchange with the woman who went on a date with him the night before he was murdered.
title: Lori Vallow accused of being argumentative during cross-examination of woman who briefly dated her husband

description: Four Democrats joined Republicans in supporting the measure, which the Senate will need to pass before it heads to Trump's desk for his signature.
title: House passes bill requiring proof of citizenship to vote in federal elections

description: The gender-inclusive approach of the National Association of Intercollegiate Gymnastics Clubs comes as trans athletes find themselves the target of increasingly heated rhetoric.
title: Trans athletes are under more scrutiny than ever. Some have found a safe space in gymnastics

description: Cabot Creamery issued a voluntarily recall for a single lot of its Extra Creamy Premium Butter, Sea Salted in seven states, totaling 1,700 pounds across 189 cases, after testing found the product to be contaminated with elevated levels of coliform bacteria, according to the U.S.
title: Cabot Creamery issues butter recall for possible fecal contamination

description: Students from California to Ohio to North Carolina are losing their visas with no explanation and being taken off the street by plainclothes officers and finding themselves subject to accusations reserved for terrorists.
title: In about half of U.S. states, international students' visas are being revoked. What’s behind it.

description: The Prada Group announced a deal Thursday to buy Italy’s Versace from the U.S. luxury group Capri Holdings under terms that value the fashion house at 1.25 billion euros ($1.4 billion).
title: Prada agrees to buy rival fashion house Versace in a deal valued at $1.4 billion

description: Johnson and Senate Majority Leader John Thune sought to present a united front as they try to sway the GOP holdouts that have threatened to tank the plan for Trump's agenda.
title: Speaker Mike Johnson presses forward with budget vote despite conservative opposition

description: Markets on Thursday gave up some of the soaring gains clocked in the aftermath of President Donald Trump’s tariffs pause announcement as the reality set in of how far duties are still set to climb.
title: Stocks open lower as tariffs reality sets in

description: A 23-year-old Maryland man was found dead while he was on vacation with his family on Paradise Island in the Bahamas, police said on Wednesday.
title: Maryland man found dead at Atlantis resort in the Bahamas

description: With a lot of uncertainty surrounding President Donald Trump’s tariffs and trade war, experts are predicting higher prices on everything from toys to electronics and decorations. NBC’s Brian Cheung joins TODAY on whether you should start your holiday shopping now.
title: With uncertainty over tariffs, should you do holiday shopping now?

description: Ksenia Karelina, an American ballerina imprisoned by Russia for more than a year for treason, is on her way back home after she was suddenly freed overnight. According to her boyfriend, she was accused of making a donation of about $50 to a Ukrainian charity after Russia invaded the country in 2022. NBC’s Molly Hunter reports for TODAY.
title: Imprisoned American ballerina Ksenia Karelina released by Russia

description: Donald Trump has paused his global tariffs plan for 90 days, except for China.
title: Trump pauses tariffs and lawyers spar in Idaho murders case: Morning Rundown

description: President Donald Trump hit pause on some of his global tariffs, sending stocks surging on Wednesday but what happens after the 90-day reprieve? CNBC’s Andrew Ross Sorkin joins TODAY to weigh in on the future of the stock market and what the bond market signaled to top advisers. "The likelihood is that there is still going to be a lot of volatility in the markets and the economy," he says.
title: Trump pauses tariffs: What happens after 90-day reprieve?

description: For decades, Major League Baseball has stood alone among the major U.S. sports leagues as the only one without a salary cap.
title: MLB weighs a salary cap as potential lockout looms in 2026

description: After President Donald Trump announced a 90-day pause on many of his sweeping tariffs on countries around the world, stock markets surged with the Dow rocketing nearly 3,000 points higher Wednesday. NBC’s Christine Romans reports for TODAY.
title: Trump's tariff reversal sparks historic stock rally

description: Sens. Adam Schiff and Ruben Gallego sent a letter to the White House pressing for answers about whether anyone engaged in insider trading before Trump's trade reversal.
title: Democratic senators press White House on insider trading allegations

description: A best-selling author was shot by police and accused of attempted murder after authorities said she pointed a gun at officers who were searching for hit-and-run suspects in a residential Los Angeles neighborhood.
title: Author and wife of Weezer bassist shot by police, who say she pointed gun at officers

description: A New York jury on Wednesday awarded $1.68 billion in damages to 40 women who accused writer and director James Toback of sexual abuse and other crimes over a span of 35 years, according to lawyers representing the plaintiffs.
title: New York jury awards $1.68 billion to women who accused writer and director Toback of sexual abuse

description: Ukrainian President Zelenskyy’s office released video of what it says is a Chinese national captured while fighting alongside Russian forces. China’s Foreign Ministry says reports of Chinese citizens joining the Russian army are “totally unfounded,” while Russia declined to comment on Zelenskyy’s claim.
title: Video shows Chinese national captured after fighting for Russia, Ukraine claims

description: A Russian-American woman who was imprisoned for treason by Russia has been freed, Secretary of State Marco Rubio said Thursday.
title: L.A. ballerina imprisoned by Russia for treason has been freed, Rubio says

description: A fresh report on U.S. inflation is expected to show a slight decline in price growth for March, but analysts say any results indicating such a slowdown probably don’t mean much anymore.
title: U.S. inflation expected to ease, but tariffs are stealing the spotlight

description: MONTGOMERY, Ala. — An Alabama teen who narrowly survived a fierce shark attack last year said she hopes a proposed alert system before state lawmakers can help keep others safe in the water.
title: Shark attack survivor presses her state for an alert system to keep people safe in the water

description: An all-British version of NBC's "Saturday Night Live" is coming next year, U.K. broadcaster Sky announced on Thursday.
title: 'SNL' launches its own British invasion, with U.K. spin-off from Lorne Michaels set for 2026

description: Sen. Adam Schiff, D-Calif., and Sen. Richard Blumenthal, D-Conn., are raising questions about Trump administration officials using early information to make trades ahead of announcements around tariffs.
title: Senators raise questions about insider trading around Trump tariff announcements

description: Gretchen Whitmer became governor after promising to “fix the damn roads” in Michigan.
title: A 'disaster': Gretchen Whitmer's talk on tariffs and meeting with Trump anger fellow Democrats

description: Trump and officials in his administration were fielding calls from worried allies, and his advisers presented him with worrying data on the bond markets.
title: How Trump changed his mind on tariffs

description: WASHINGTON — The U.S. Postal Service is seeking a rate increase this summer that includes hiking the cost of a first-class stamp from 73 cents to 78 cents.
title: Postage stamps may be getting more expensive — again

description: DALLAS — Luka Doncic entered the court with the Los Angeles Lakers for his first game back in Dallas to cheers in an arena where draped over every seat was a T-shirt with “Hvala za vse” across the front.
title: For Luka Doncic, a teary return to Dallas

description: A judge has dismissed conspiracy and kidnapping charges against five Massachusetts college students who were accused of plotting to lure a man to their campus through a dating app and then seizing him as part of a trend on social media.
title: Charges are dropped against college students in 'Catch a Predator' case

description: House Republicans passed a bill aiming to curb district court judges' ability to issue nationwide injunctions, which have stymied Trump's agenda.
title: House votes to rein in federal judges amid Trump's attacks on the courts

description: President Trump directed federal agencies to revoke the security clearances and review the activities of Christopher Krebs and Miles Taylor.
title: Trump orders probes of two former officials who defied him
